extension.summary: Skins und Skin Themen by Guidos Skinbase.
Skins and Skin Themen by Guidos Skinbase.
extension.description: Guidos Skinbase Repo. Die Gröste Skinbase der Welt mit unzähligen Skin Mods und Skin Themen aus der ganzen Welt. Ständig Erweitert und Verbessert, so sollte für jeden was dabei sein Viel Spass.

Guido's Skinbase Repo. The world's largest skinbase with countless skin mods and skin themes from around the world. Constantly extended and improved, so there should be something for everyone Have fun.
extension.news: Guidos Skinbase Repo. Die Gröste Skinbase der Welt mit unzähligen Skin Mods und Skin Themen aus der ganzen Welt. Ständig Erweitert und Verbessert, so sollte für jeden was dabei sein Viel Spass.

Guido's Skinbase Repo. The world's largest skinbase with countless skin mods and skin themes from around the world. Constantly extended and improved, so there should be something for everyone Have fun.

[B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.5[/I][CR]- Fix color customization not opening[CR]- Small redesign of DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add and fix some Widget plugin paths[CR]- Revert PNG changes that altered panel colors[CR]- Add support for animated weather icons[CR]- Add background selection to Music Viz[CR]- Add LibreELEC to settings[CR][I]v6.0.4[/I][CR]- Compatibility updates for new Skin Helper version[CR]- Add manfeeds Video Lyrics mod v2 (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Add option to hide player control buttons on Music OSD[CR]- Redesigned System Settings screen[CR]- New logo (thanks GTunney!)[CR][I]v6.0.3[/I][CR]- Add player controls to sidemenu[CR]- Add option to disable Widget fanart[CR]- Shuffle skin settings with added catagories[CR]- Add FAQ in Help section[CR]- Add option to hide Home Window elements when pressing back[CR]- Add option to use paused label instead of image[CR]- Add snow to Music Viz background[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master
